banner.title: Our Services
banner.description: We offer a wide range of services and programs aimed at empowering and developing the community and achieving sustainable development.

section.title: What We Offer
section.description: We are committed to providing outstanding services that meet the needs of beneficiaries and elevate the level of developmental and humanitarian work.

list.title: Women's Services
features: Vocational courses (sewing, embroidery, home cooking, hairdressing, soap and natural products).
Psychosocial support for women affected by war or violence.
Health awareness (reproductive health, nutrition, prenatal care).
Economic empowerment sessions (small project management, home marketing).
In-kind assistance for widows, divorcees, and female breadwinners (occasionally).

list.title: Child Services
features: Psychological support for trauma-affected children.
Psychological discharge activities (drawing, theater, play, music).
Tutoring and remedial education.
Community nursery or kindergarten.
Child protection programs and awareness of rights.
Care for children with mild disabilities or learning difficulties.

list.title: Youth Empowerment
features: Life skills courses (leadership, communication, teamwork).
Vocational training (carpentry, electricity, mobile phones, computers).
Technical courses (graphic design, programming, digital marketing).
Support for community youth initiatives.
Entrepreneurship and small project management for youth.

list.title: Social and Humanitarian Services
features: Distribution of food parcels and relief aid (occasionally through partners).
Winter and summer aid - blankets and clothes (occasionally through partners).
Medical assistance (medical days and health awareness).
Community awareness sessions (domestic violence, early marriage, school dropout).

list.title: Organizational and Developmental Services
features: Case Management for the most vulnerable families.
Program monitoring and evaluation.
Beneficiary data collection.
Reporting for donors.
Implementing locally or internationally funded projects.
